reservations.name: Shinjuku Granbell Hotel
reservations.description: A stylish hotel located in the heart of Shinjuku with modern amenities and great city views.

transportation.name: Round-trip flight from Gainesville to Tokyo
transportation.description: Round-trip airfare from Gainesville, FL to Tokyo, Japan.

vacation.climate: Spring in Tokyo is mild and pleasant, with temperatures ranging from 50°F to 70°F.

day1.day_description: On your first day, explore the vibrant streets of Shibuya and visit the iconic Shibuya Crossing.

activities.title: Ichiran Ramen
activities.description: Famous ramen restaurant where you can enjoy personalized ramen in a unique setting.

activities.title: Visit the Meiji Shrine
activities.description: A beautiful Shinto shrine surrounded by a serene forest, perfect for a peaceful stroll.

day2.day_description: Explore the historic Asakusa district and experience traditional Japanese culture.

activities.title: Senso-ji Temple Street Food
activities.description: Try a variety of local street foods like Ningyo-Yaki and melon bread along the path to Senso-ji.

activities.title: Visit Senso-ji Temple
activities.description: Tokyo's oldest temple, renowned for its stunning architecture and rich history.

day3.day_description: Discover the fashionable Harajuku district and enjoy shopping and people-watching.

activities.title: Harajuku Crepes
activities.description: Amazing crepes filled with a variety of delicious ingredients, a must-try in Harajuku.

activities.title: Explore Takeshita Street
activities.description: A bustling street lined with trendy shops, cafes, and unique fashion boutiques.

day4.day_description: Visit Tokyo Tower and enjoy panoramic views of the city, followed by a relaxing afternoon in Ueno Park.

activities.title: Tokyo Tower's Cafe
activities.description: Enjoy a meal with a view at the cafe located atop Tokyo Tower.

activities.title: Visit Tokyo Tower
activities.description: An iconic symbol of Tokyo, offering breathtaking views from its observation decks.
